thread.title: Why are we still paying to use a card?
thread.title_full: Why are we still paying to use a card?

title: Why are we still paying to use a card?
text:
Topix › Pacific Travel › Why are we still paying to use a card? Why are we still paying to use a card? Next Story Prev Story 3 hrs ago Read more: NEWS.com.au 
AS CASH becomes obsolete and we're racing towards paying for everything on a smartphone, we can't help but wonder why fees and minimum spends still exist. A ZERO balance transfer deal on your credit card may seem like a great idea at first, but it turns out that it does not necessarily help pay off your debts. Start the conversation, or Read more at NEWS.com.au.
